room_title: Escape room "Cold War Spy" by Outsmart Escape Rooms in South Bend
room_description: Agents, we have reason to believe that the CIA has been infiltrated by a Soviet Spy. Over the past year, more than 20 CIA and FBI Soviet operations have been compromised leading to the betrayal of at least 30 agents and execution of 10 U.S. operatives. We've narrowed down the suspects to 8 agents. We need to find this mole to finally put the Cold War behind us. Good luck and move quickly!
